languages.text: "Нам не стоит медлить". {n}Хейнрикс отворачивается, на его лице написаны обычная строгость и целеустремленность.{/n} "Все же мы не в лучшем месте для бесед".
"We shouldn't delay." {n}Heinrix looks away, his usual severity and single-mindedness plain to see on his face.{/n} "This is hardly the best place to stop and have a chat."
languages.original_text: "Нам не стоит медлить". {n}Хейнрикс отворачивается, на его лице написаны обычная строгость и целеустремленность.{/n} "Все же мы не в лучшем месте для бесед".

traits.locale_text: "We shouldn't delay." {n}Heinrix looks away, his usual severity and single-mindedness plain to see on his face.{/n} "This is hardly the best place to stop and have a chat."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We shouldn't delay." {n}Heinrix looks away, his usual severity and single-mindedness plain to see on his face.{/n} "This is hardly the best place to stop and have a chat."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We shouldn't delay." {n}Heinrix looks away, his usual severity and single-mindedness plain to see on his face.{/n} "This is hardly the best place to stop and have a chat."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «No debemos retrasarnos». {n}Heinrix aparta la mirada, dejando que su habitual severidad y concentración vuelvan a su rostro.{/n} «Este no es precisamente el lugar ideal para detenernos a charlar».
languages.original_text: "We shouldn't delay." {n}Heinrix looks away, his usual severity and single-mindedness plain to see on his face.{/n} "This is hardly the best place to stop and have a chat."

traits.locale_text: «No debemos retrasarnos». {n}Heinrix aparta la mirada, dejando que su habitual severidad y concentración vuelvan a su rostro.{/n} «Este no es precisamente el lugar ideal para detenernos a charlar».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「先を急ごう」{n}ハインリックスは目をそらし、いつもの厳しさと一途さが垣間見える表情を浮かべた。{/n}「ここは長居して暇つぶしするような場所ではない」
languages.original_text: "We shouldn't delay." {n}Heinrix looks away, his usual severity and single-mindedness plain to see on his face.{/n} "This is hardly the best place to stop and have a chat."

traits.locale_text: 「先を急ごう」{n}ハインリックスは目をそらし、いつもの厳しさと一途さが垣間見える表情を浮かべた。{/n}「ここは長居して暇つぶしするような場所ではない」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我们不能停留太久。”{n}海因里希转开目光，表情一如既往地严肃、专注。{/n}“这可不是休息聊天的好地方。”
languages.original_text: "We shouldn't delay." {n}Heinrix looks away, his usual severity and single-mindedness plain to see on his face.{/n} "This is hardly the best place to stop and have a chat."

traits.locale_text: “我们不能停留太久。”{n}海因里希转开目光，表情一如既往地严肃、专注。{/n}“这可不是休息聊天的好地方。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Nous ferions mieux de nous hâter. L'endroit est mal choisi pour avoir une conversation. » {n}Il détourne le regard en affichant clairement sa sévérité et sa détermination habituelle.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We shouldn't delay." {n}Heinrix looks away, his usual severity and single-mindedness plain to see on his face.{/n} "This is hardly the best place to stop and have a chat."

traits.locale_text: « Nous ferions mieux de nous hâter. L'endroit est mal choisi pour avoir une conversation. » {n}Il détourne le regard en affichant clairement sa sévérité et sa détermination habituelle.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Wir sollten keine Zeit verlieren." {n}Heinrix blickt weg. Seine übliche Strenge und singuläre Zielstrebigkeit stehen ihm deutlich ins Gesicht geschrieben.{/n} "Das ist wohl kaum der geeignete Ort für eine kleine Plauderei."
languages.original_text: "We shouldn't delay." {n}Heinrix looks away, his usual severity and single-mindedness plain to see on his face.{/n} "This is hardly the best place to stop and have a chat."

traits.locale_text: "Wir sollten keine Zeit verlieren." {n}Heinrix blickt weg. Seine übliche Strenge und singuläre Zielstrebigkeit stehen ihm deutlich ins Gesicht geschrieben.{/n} "Das ist wohl kaum der geeignete Ort für eine kleine Plauderei."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Oyalanmayalım." {n}Heinrix, yüzünde her zaman açıkça görülebilen o katı ve kararlı ifadeyle uzaklara bakıyor.{/n} "Burası, durup sohbet etmeye uygun bir yer sayılmaz."
languages.original_text: "We shouldn't delay." {n}Heinrix looks away, his usual severity and single-mindedness plain to see on his face.{/n} "This is hardly the best place to stop and have a chat."
